item.title: The Superman Trailer Perfectly Pays Off DC's New Man Of Steel Actor Breaking A 37-Year-Old Record
item.description: Superman's trailer has provided a much more detailed look at David Corenswet's new Man of Steel, and he breaks a very old live-action Superman record.

item.title: 10 Movies That Have Multiple Main Characters
item.description: Movies with multiple main characters can add depth and intrigue to films, allowing varied themes and ideas to be more thoroughly explored.

item.title: The MCU's Most Controversial Show Perfectly Explains Why President Ross Becomes Red Hulk In Fascinating Captain America 4 Theory
item.description: A new MCU theory connects President Ross' Red Hulk transformation in Captain America: Brave New World to one of Marvel's lowest-rated projects.
